creditline: The Marguerite S. McNally Endowment for Art Acquisition, the Susan Jacobsen Endowment for Art Acquisition, the Dolly J. Fiterman Fund, the Richard and Beverly Fink Endowment for Art Acquisition, and the Paul and Gisela Konopka Endowment Fund
description: surreal image; blonde woman wearing yellow waitress uniform dress, pink apron, yellow socks and sandals, at left, being lifted from water by her hair, intertwined in an egg beater, held by a flying bare-chested woman wearing a salmon-colored skirt with a red pinwheel on her back; dog and fish on horizontal dock, with net holding red lobster; razor blade in a pink circle in URQ with radiating turquoise circles; turquoise water; framed in light wood shadowbox-like frame
title: Resurrection of the Waitress
